channel.title: Joe Alwyn on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Joe Alwyn on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Hamlet’ Review: Riz Ahmed Tackles Shakespeare’s Most Famous Hero in a Shaky Contemporary Version
item.description: Set in the Indian community in London, the Telluride-premiering film relies (mostly) on the Bard’s language.
